description: A structured walkthrough of the semester lifecycle: planning (creating terms/offerings), onboarding (inviting faculty), and auditing (reviewing outcomes).
talking_points: System Date Override allows testing full semester cycles in minutes
Streamlined faculty onboarding via email invitations
Closed-loop audit workflow ensures data quality

steps.name: Verify Environment & Date
steps.purpose: Confirm the late-December override is active so the Fall semester and CLO closeout feel complete

instructions.human:
The server has been seeded with the Institution Admin date set to Dec 23, 2025 (right after classes ended and before CLO due dates).

Login as 'demo2025.admin@example.com' (Password: Demo2025!).
Notice the yellow 'System Date Override' banner and the busy Fall 2025 summary.

expected_results: Banner shows: 'System Date Override Active: Dec 23, 2025'

steps.name: Create Spring 2026 Term

instructions.human:
Navigate to 'Terms' from the dashboard.
Click 'Create New Term'.

Enter Details:
- Name: Spring 2026
- Code: SP2026
- Start: Jan 15, 2026
- End: May 15, 2026
- Assessment Due: May 20, 2026

Click 'Create Term'.

expected_results: Spring 2026 term appears in list with 'Upcoming' status

post_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM terms WHERE code='SP2026' LIMIT 1"

steps.name: Create Course Offering
steps.purpose: Create offering for BIOL-101 in the new Spring 2026 term

pre_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM courses WHERE course_number='BIOL-101' LIMIT 1"
sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM programs WHERE short_name='ZOOL' LIMIT 1"

instructions.human:
Navigate to 'Course Offerings'.
Click 'Create New Course Offering'.

Select:
- Course: BIOL-101
- Term: Spring 2026
- Program: Biology (or Zoology)

(Sections: Use default '001')

Click 'Create Offering'.

expected_results: Course offering created for BIOL-101 in Spring 2026

post_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM course_offerings WHERE course_id='{{biol101_id}}' AND term_id='{{sp26_term_id}}' LIMIT 1"
sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM course_sections WHERE section_number='001' AND offering_id='{{sp26_offering_id}}' LIMIT 1"

steps.name: Invite New Faculty
steps.purpose: Onboard new faculty member for the new section

instructions.human:
Navigate to the 'Course Sections' panel (or page).
Find 'BIOL-101 (Section 001)' for Spring 2026.
Click the 'Invite Instructor' (user-plus) icon.

In the modal:
- Email: dr.newguy@example.com
- First Name: New
- Last Name: Guy
- Section: BIOL-101 - Section 001 (Should be pre-selected)

Click 'Send Invitation'.

steps.name: Faculty Registration

pre_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT token FROM user_invitations WHERE email='dr.newguy@example.com' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1"

instructions.human:
Logout as Admin.
(In a real flow, checking email) -> Simulate clicking the invite link.

Simulate Invite Acceptance:
- Token: (hidden)
- Password: Password123!
- Display Name: Dr. New Guy

Login as 'dr.newguy@example.com' and verify visualization of the assigned course.

expected_results: Logged in as Dr. New Guy

steps.name: Time Jump: Dec 23, 2025
steps.purpose: Advance timeline to the last stretch between the Fall 2025 end of classes and the CLO due date

instructions.human:
Logout Dr. New Guy.
Login as 'demo2025.admin@example.com' (Demo2025!).

Use the Date Override feature to jump to: December 23, 2025.
This simulates the busy window after final exams but before CLO due dates.

steps.name: Audit Queue Review

instructions.human:
Navigate to 'Audit CLO' page.
Review the list:
- Identify the submission for BIOL-101 (Seeded with 'Rework Needed' status/content).
- Identify the missing submission for ZOOL-101.

expected_results: Progress summary shows ~85% of CLOs completed

pre_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM course_outcomes WHERE clo_number='4' AND description LIKE '%basket%' LIMIT 1"

instructions.human:
Click 'Request Rework' on the BIOL-101 CLO #4.
Comment: 'Description mismatch. Please correct copy/paste error.'
Confirm.

data.comments: Description mismatch. Please correct copy/paste error.

instructions.human:
Logout Admin.
Login as 'dr.morgan@demo.example.com' (Instructor123!).

Notice the 'Needs Rework' badge.
Edit CLO #4: Change 'Basket Weaving' -> 'Scientific Method'.
Resubmit.

steps.name: Time Jump: Feb 10, 2026
steps.purpose: Return to the new year when Spring 2026 prep and CLO closeout wrap up

instructions.human:
Logout the instructor session.
Login as 'demo2025.admin@example.com'.

Use the Date Override feature to jump to: February 10, 2026.
This puts us into the term reset where the new offering should be visible and the audit queue readies for final decisions.

expected_results: Spring 2026 offering is now visible in the dashboard summaries
Audit queue still shows the outstanding Needs Rework/NCI items from December

steps.name: Final Approvals & Follow-up
steps.purpose: Admin ties up the December audit thread, sends a follow-up invitation, and confirms Spring 2026 is ready

pre_commands.command: sqlite3 course_records_dev.db "SELECT id FROM course_outcomes WHERE clo_number='5' AND description LIKE '%unicorns%' LIMIT 1"

instructions.human:
Logout Dr. Morgan.
Login as 'demo2025.admin@example.com'.

Navigate to 'Course Sections' and verify the Spring 2026 offering now shows (feel free to reopen that section's row).
Click the green 'Invite' button on BIOL-101 Section 001 to reopen the unified invite modal and send Dr. New Guy a follow-up message.
Then go to the Audit page.
1. Verify CLO #4 is fixed. Click 'Approve'.
2. Locate ZOOL-101 CLO #5. Click 'Mark NCI' (Never Coming In). Comment: 'Faculty unreachable'.

Audit queue should be empty and Spring 2026 prep is complete.

expected_results: Spring 2026 checklist looks ready and the follow-up email was sent
Fall 2025 closeout and straggler NCI/approval decisions are reflected in the audit summary

steps.name: Demo Complete
steps.purpose: Wrap up the multi-beat story that traveled from late Dec 2025 through Feb 2026

instructions.human:
Demo successfully completed.
Shown: Planning (SP26), Onboarding (Invite/Register), the December audit loop, plus the February follow-up finishing Spring 2026 prep.
